attributes.action: Add rules to make the grand national safer for the running horses!
attributes.additional_details: This year one horse was shot due to injury which then still got up and ran. Children shouldn’t have to see this, nobody should!
attributes.background: I’m not asking for the grand national to be banned, It would be nice if there could be rules in place for less horses to run and smaller fences. At least give the horses more chance of survival! It breaks my heart every year how many get injured or worse!
